short_description: showcase restoration is a damage restoration & mold remediation services company based in fayetteville, north carolina, united states.
long_description: showcase restoration was founded as a construction company in fayetteville, nc in 1979. since that time, showcase restoration has been providing disaster response and restoration services. with over 42 years serving communities across eastern north carolina, including fayetteville, wilmington, lumberton, southern pines, and the surrounding areas, we take pride in delivering quality work, great communication, and a compassionate, qualified team to help you through the restoration process. showcase restoration has been providing restoration services to residential and commercial clients since 1979, successfully completing over 23,000 restoration projects. we are proud to be known as a disaster restoration leader in the carolinas. as established experts in residential and commercial restoration, we are preferred vendors for multiple insurance companies. we'll work with you and your insurance adjuster to deliver quality finished projects on budget and on time.
